name: Flappy Turret
description:
The Ultimate Turret Jumper Is Based On The Original Game Series And The Franchise 'Turret Jumper' By Future Games!

The Game Is Also Named As 'Flappy Turret'

___Quick Credits___

Developed By: OrfeasWorldGames Studio, Cookie Studios & Future Games

Publisher: Future Games

___LINKS___

Future Games

OrfeasWorldGames Studio

Cookie Studios

___Inspirations___

TUTJ Is  Based On The Original Game 'Flappy Bird'

TUTJ Is Also Based On The Game 'Orfea's Flappy EX Guy Game' By OrfeasWorldGames Studio & Cookie Studios!

Play OFBG HERE

Play Turret Jumper (Demo)  HERE

Play Turret Jumper Classic HERE

Play Turret Jumper 2 HERE

All Characters Are Based By Future Game's Creations!

___Controls___

LMB To Jump

___SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS___

________MINIMUM________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR : INTEL CORE 2 Duo e8400 

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTS 450 1GB LP- Radeon R5 230 1GB

•RAM: 3GB RAM

•DirectX: VERSION 11

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300 MB AVAILABLE SPACE

________RECOMMENDED________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR: INTEL CORE i3 5157U

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTX 750ti 2GB-R9 270X 2GB

•RAM: 4GB RAM 

 •DirectX: VERSION 11

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR MAC_____

•PROCCESOR: INTEL (64-bit)  CORE I3-5157U OR BETTER (it might run on intel core duo but with not a good experience)

•RAM: 2GB RAM OR MORE

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 300MB AVAILABLE SPACE

•DISPLAY: ANY

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR LINUX_____

  • 3 GHz Dual PROCESSOR 
  • 4 GB RAM
  • GTX 1050 2GB/ RADEON RX  550 2GB
  • 1090 x 1080 RESOLUTION (or any)
  • LESS THAN 300 MB STORAGE SPACE

The Developers Describe The Content Like This:

This Game contains content which is appropriate for all ages! Rated For Everyone!
